content:
/>
V.iii.1.B.5.g
.
Evaluating Metatarsalgia or Morton’s Disease
Anterior metatarsalgia of any type, to include cases due to Morton’s Disease, will be evaluated under
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5279
.
The DC provides for an evaluation of 10 percent regardless of whether the condition is unilateral or bilateral.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Musculoskeletal Disabilities of the Extremities and Spine
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
